scripts.start: pm2 flush && pm2 start main.js --name trx --node-args="-r esm -r dotenv/config" && pm2 logs trx
scripts.stop: pm2 stop trx && pm2 delete trx
scripts.restart: yarn stop && pm2 flush && yarn start
scripts.release:git: github-release release --user bitslercasino --repo tronlet --tag v1.1.0 --name "v1.1.0" --description "trx wallet release"
scripts.release:upload: github-release upload --user bitslercasino  --repo tronlet --tag v1.1.0 --name "bitsler_trx.sh" --file bitsler_trx.sh
scripts.build:release: docker build -t unibtc/trx:latest -t unibtc/trx:1.1.0 . && git add . && git commit -m "update" && git push && yarn release:now && docker push unibtc/trx:latest && docker push unibtc/trx:1.1.0
